setInstallerVariable.value: Welcome to the Shure Designer Upgrade Wizard.

setInstallerVariable.value: Setup is now ready to begin installing Shure Designer on your computer.

throwError.text: Processor needs have at least 4 cores.

8 Gigbytes are required for Shure Designer.

showWarning.text: At least 16GB of RAM is recommended.

There is a 4.x or 5.x Designer running

showWarning.text: There appears to be a 4.x or 5.x version Designer click OK to force a close on this version of Designer. Once OK is pressed, any unsaved work will be discarded.

showInfo.text: Shure Designer Desktop is currently running. Please exit the application to continue.

throwError.text: Processor needs have at least 4 cores.

showInfo.text: Shure Designer Desktop is currently running. Please exit the application to continue.

logMessage.text: Checking if installpackageplatform is set to x64 (mac-x86_64)

throwError.text: the osx-x64 version is required to install on this platform.

logMessage.text: Checking if installpackageplatform is set to arm64 (mac-arm64)

throwError.text: the osx-arm64 version is required to install on this platform.

logMessage.text: Entered Version Check. New Version (Installer Version) set to ${NewVersion}:

throwError.text: A newer version of Designer, ${PreviousVersion}, is already installed. Installer will exit.

logMessage.text: Show Question Dialogue for uninstalling previous version

showQuestion.text: Would you like to upgrade the previous version to a newer version?

logMessage.text: Error running program, and/or setting Version
Error running get CPU, and/or setting ${CPU}
Error getting free disk space and setting FreeDisk to ${FreeDisk}
Error running get CPU, and/or setting CPU to ${CPU}
Error getting free disk space and setting FreeDisk to ${FreeDisk}
Checks for 5GB of free disk space

throwError.text: Need at least 5GB of free disk space

logMessage.text: Setting up Shure Designer 6 - Device Management firewall for Designer

runProgram.programArguments: advfirewall firewall add rule name="Shure Designer 6 - Device Management" dir=in action=allow program="${windows_folder_local_appdata}\shuregql-nodejs\Cache\phoenix-server\13.0.5-0\bin\Windows\x86_64\VS2019\Win10\ShureDeviceManager.exe" enable=yes localport=8427 protocol=UDP

advfirewall firewall add rule name="Shure Designer 6 - Device Management" dir=out action=allow program="${windows_folder_local_appdata}\shuregql-nodejs\Cache\phoenix-server\13.0.5-0\bin\Windows\x86_64\VS2019\Win10\ShureDeviceManager.exe" enable=yes localport=8427 protocol=UDP

logMessage.text: VCRuntime new version number set to ${VCRuntimeNewVersionNumber}
Executes RuntimeExitCode if there is no InstalledVCRuntimeVersion, or if the installedVCRuntimeVersion is less than VCRuntimeNewVersionNumber
Executes electron installer and waits until it is done then continues with install builder installer
Failed to run defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.apple.alf globalstate

Firewall is enabled adding to firewall - running sudo -u ${system_username} /usr/libexec/ApplicationFirewall/socketfilterfw --add "${installdir}/${application}"

Error applying .rdf file association to Shure Designer Desktop

Would you like to remove Designer related Logs and User Preferences?

runProgram.programArguments: advfirewall firewall delete rule name="Shure Designer 6 - Device Management"

logMessage.text: FirewallRuleExists contains a rule for Designer, removed running sudo -u root /usr/libexec/ApplicationFirewall/socketfilterfw --remove "${user_home_directory}/Library/Caches/shuregql-nodejs/phoenix-server/13.0.29-0/bin/OSX/Clang/10.15/ShureDeviceManager"

setInstallerVariableFromScriptOutput.execArgs: -u ${system_username} defaults read com.apple.dock persistent-apps | grep file-label\" | awk -v app="Shure Designer Desktop" '$0 ~ app {print NR}'

setInstallerVariableFromScriptOutput.execArgs: -u ${system_username} defaults read com.apple.dock persistent-apps | grep file-label\" | awk -v app="Shure Designer Desktop" '$0 ~ app {print NR}'

labelParameter.name: DiskCheck
labelParameter.title: Not enough hard drive space
labelParameter.description: Drive free space: ${FreeDisk} GB Designer install size: 5 GB
